website_summaries.verdict: These top-quality leather and sturdy boots are perfect to protect your kids'  feet in the snow, mud, and rain. Made from 100% waterproof material. Your kid will love the style, look, and feel of these Timberland boots.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors
Padded collar gives a comfortable fit around the ankle and helps keep out debris
cons: They run a bit large and can feel stiff

customer_reviews.title: Not Real
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed because these are a gift for my daughters birthday. Plus, I just bought the grey pair that are authentic last month! These are definitely NOT REAL! They’re super lightweight, they don’t have a logo on the tongue or the insoles, 1 boot is lopsided and the logo isn’t visible unless u are up close & they have all kinda stitching defects. I will be returning these ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Ta'nyra Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Timbs
customer_reviews.text: The price of the shoe reflects that these are for a much smaller foot. If you go to authorized sellers of the Timberland brand, you will know that the smaller foot you have-the less you pay for a quality product. The boots are waterproof, weatherproof and will keep your feet warm. Lastly, these are certainly authentic. Last time I went to Century 21 in NYC and they have a few selections of timberland boots. Mostly in the kids section. I had to check to be sure they were authentic. This may or may not be an authorized dealer but-business is business.
customer_reviews.author: LlamaDramaMama

customer_reviews.title: kinda funny, isn't it
customer_reviews.text: as a man no longer bound, no longer tethered to this place, these boots will take me where i need to go, which is away from here. yes sir, these boots will take me from this place, and to any place else. and heck, these boots will take me away from that place too. life's... kinda funny, isn't it?
customer_reviews.author: Keith J Carberry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 7.5 women, and ordered a 5.5 big kids. The shoe is in mint condition and fits just as I hoped. They even included a return order form in case I wasn't satisfied. Furthermore, my Timberland's were not expected until March 10th, I received them March 4th. Score. Don't hesitate, this company is reliable and honest.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany N. Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Better off barefoot
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable pair of shoes I've ever owned. Have gone through more insoles than i can count. At one point i had 3 different ones at the same time just to attempt to stand in them for more than 5 minutes. The tongue is attached all the way up, had to take a razor blade to it just so i could get my foot in. So disappointed, maybe little kids don't care cuz they grow out of them in 5 minutes, but as an adult with small feet, they were horrendous!
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: They sent me DIRTY TIMS WTF
customer_reviews.text: The shoe came and I was highly disappointed the shoe is dirty with white powdery stuff on the bottom I wear Tim’s all year if I could however knowing for sure they are not suppose to have this residue I’m going to be returning these and asking for an exchange for a new pair something they got from a second hand party worn I paid for the new give me the new wave don’t pay amazon this much money to have problems as such. You all have to do better with your customers if we are not happy you won’t see any real profit
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Love tims!!
customer_reviews.text: So I am a size 8 in women shoes, size 6 is boys sneakers. I originally ordered a size 6 thinking this would fit perfect but it was way to big. I then got a size 5.5 and it fits amazing! I had to go 2.5 sizes down to fit good. And the timberland box was completely totaled upon arrival. So was the size 6 box was damaged. If you want a clean box do not order. If you just care about the boots go ahead!! Save yourself almost half the price of full retail
customer_reviews.author: Chrys Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Timberland boots! I'm a size 7 in women's and I ordered the boots in size 5. They fit perfectly! They're very comfortable, warm, and definitely waterproof. I look forward to using them for hiking and when I go traveling in Asia this winter! The only downside is that they are tight around the ankles (not uncomfortably so, just tighter fitting) and I must tuck my pants into my socks or else the boot pushes the pants legs up my leg.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa22

customer_reviews.title: Something odd
customer_reviews.text: I was already planning on giving this purchase a 5 star, I trust Timberland boots and the reviews where decent. Then I went to wear them and the left boot looked odd.. there was some kind of misplacement when making this. I can provide a picture so it makes sense, but in this current screen there’s no option for it.
customer_reviews.author: La Luna Verde

customer_reviews.title: Customer for Life
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing these boots for my grandson for years. He outgrows them before they wear out. They look great with his jeans and I don't worry about his feet getting wet if it's snowing or raining. Customer for life, I started starting these for my granddaughter too. The quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: rmg1960

customer_reviews.title: Got these for work. No breaking-in period required!
customer_reviews.text: I am a field biologist and wear a women’s size 8 to 8.5. I usually wear Keen hiking boots but they are so heavy and rub my heel after a while. I decided to order a boys 7 in these and I am beyond satisfied with them. Not to mention they were over $50 cheaper than buying the exact pair in women’s sizing. There was literally no breaking in needed. They are SO comfy and and relatively light compared to my other work boots. They feel pretty durable, but I’ve only worn them a few times so guess we will see how they hold up. They do scuff very easily, but since I’m wearing them for work I don’t care.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with these boots.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these boots. I previously check the outlet Timberland stores and tried on the shoes so I knew the size I purchased would fit. I bought the boy size because I like the style better than the female. I bought them 1.5 sizes smaller than my size of my standard females shoes. I have some spare room but I wanted to be able to wear thick socks if necessary during the colder months. They fit as expected and are comfortable. Price was great compared to all other places. I would recommend these to anyone and I've already told other if they are looking for Timberlands to check Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: XXT

customer_reviews.title: Nothing nice to say about this boot.
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this same type of boot for the last 15 years, they were the best work boots until this last pair I purchased, these boots are not the same quality as I purchased previously. The leather is poor quality, does not fit like they use to and they are much larger. The shoestrings are way to short, I barely could tie the strings. I will be sending them back this week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING WINTER BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I was really going to get the $180 dollar pair on the timberland website, but I decided to wait. Low and behold I hit a holy grail. I followed the reviews and got a US Big Kid size 5.5 because I’m normally a US Women’s 7.5 in sneakers. They are really comfortable and REAL! The shoes are waterproof, stylish, and less than half the price of the market value. I love these shoes. I’m more than ready for the brutal winter. SN/ They fit well while leaving just enough room for some thick winter socks.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Love them - but they run BIG
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes - no problem with service. My 12 year old son wears a size 6 in New Balance. I ordered a 6 and a 6.5 in this shoe. Even the 6 was HUGE. I needed to go an entire size DOWN to compensate. Just letting everyone know! Runs BIG - not like a sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: SharonH

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure how it because I bought this for ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how it because I bought this for my son for Christmas. If its too big I don't Care .he will grow in it . kids grow fast anyway. These boots are clean as hell! Im thinking about buying a pair for my damn self!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: FAKE! These are made in China as Timberlands are NOT! The seller insist these are authentic and I have many pairs of timberlands, I literally sat there and compared every single thing from the stitching to the sole. Glue was left all over the shoe, sign number one! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Damaris

customer_reviews.title: Great look and quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 7th grade son for Christmas. He loves them! These are real Tim's so the quality and fit is there. Great boots. We live in MN and get lots of snow. He refused to wear winter boots (he's too cool for those) but will wear these. I'm satisfied! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Men's boots I bought for me (I am a woman) over 3 years ago and I still love them. I have worn them all day jogging and walking back and forth across fairgrounds at horse shows, digging in my garden, and working at my stables. They are not worn daily, but at least weekly and they still look great and holding up exceptionally well. My last pair of work boots lasted 18 years under the same conditions. I am hoping these will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: gerry

customer_reviews.title: Useful but not authentic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this was an authentic Timberland boot. The shoelaces were thin and don’t seem durable at all. My socks had a bunch of orange/yellow fuzzies stuck to it from the inside sole of the boot. My other timberland boots did not do this. I am only keeping it because I know I can wear these boots and not have to care too much about getting them dirty or abusing them when I ride my motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: MLo

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for looks and durability!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter last Christmas and they have held up excellent! She has gotten a lot of use out of them and they still look great. I also purchased a 3 pack of the Timberland socks to go with them and they have held up great as well. She wears these with skinny jeans or leggings and they look really cute. She recently bought a Timberland boot cleaning kit to clean up a couple scuff marks and they came right off! Great quality boot for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Olive oil

customer_reviews.title: These are INSULATED WINTER BOOTS, not hiking boots!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for HIKING BOOTS for my daughter for SUMMER! THEY ARE INSULATED, and NOT summer or hiking boots. Had to take away my daughter's birthday present, and return them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Boot Ladies
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the boots in a boys size 6.5 however they were too big. I am a womens size 8.5 or 9 medium in shoes. I reordered the boots in a boys size 5.5. The boot fit was great. I don't wear heavy socks so the length and width was fine. If you wear heavy thick socks you should go up to a boys size 6.
customer_reviews.author: Babygirl

customer_reviews.title: Careful on sizing
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a pair of timberlands for awhile and so glad I happen upon these for the cheap price. I wear a size 9 in women's and wished I had ordered the size 6m instead of the 6w. The 6w was a little too roomy. Good overall
customer_reviews.author: camedwards

customer_reviews.title: The size of 4Y Nike jogging shoes is comfortable and a little roomier for me
customer_reviews.text: I‘m an adult woman, have a pair of thin and small feet - 22.5 cm. The size of 4Y Nike jogging shoes is comfortable and a little roomier for me. According to the reviews, I chose the ’ 3M US little kid'. Fits well. It‘s a little tight for the first time to wear with thick socks. But after several hours it seemed to stretched a little and fit very well. If your feet are short but a little fat, W is better than M.
customer_reviews.author: Zongyou

customer_reviews.title: Please Read before purchasing these boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time or money these boots were not authentic Timberland boots!!! I received a FAKE pair!!!! Just pay the extra money and purchase from a retail store 💯
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: A Great Shoe for Active Kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for our niece and she loves them! They look HUGE in the box, but the fit was perfect and they don't look so big once they are on. They have held up really nicely though as she has worth them to school and quite a few walks since she has had them. The color is also solid black and doesn't fade like you may see with other forms of this material. I would say that they are the usual quality that you expect from the timberland brand.
customer_reviews.author: Living in Glitter

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: The overall good shoes, that is, the surface has a lot of small black spots like a small insect bite, rub off the. The shoebox label is very strange, like looking for alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: dickyims

customer_reviews.title: Warm but not very feminine
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for heavy-metal-looking winter boots that check all the boxes, these would be a good fit for you. I just wasn't a fan of the design on these, so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst

customer_reviews.title: Great Condition/Brand New
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair for my twin brother size 7 in boys. They are in good shape and great to wear. I'm satisfied. I would recommend buying them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sharna

customer_reviews.title: Complaining About This Shoes Faults..
customer_reviews.text: This Is A Good Shoe To Use In The Snow But When Using This Shoe It Feels Very Weighted On The Heavy Side That Is And This Shoe Makes A Lot Of Noise With Every Step That You Take With This Shoe Anywhere You Go..The Only Exception That Applies To This Is In The Snow..There, The Sound Of The Shoes Is Muffled Out By The Snow..But Anywhere Else Good Luck Getting This Shoe To Make Less Noise Than It Is.
customer_reviews.author: Esponix

customer_reviews.title: Buy kids size for a better deal
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 3 for my niece because Timberlands are what teens wear and she was happy to receive them. She has been wearing them for a year with no complaints. I ordered the kids size because the price was much cheaper and I checked and these are authentic Timberlands.
customer_reviews.author: skye

customer_reviews.title: Solid Sturdy Boots
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting timberlands for my son since he turned 3. He destroyed pair after pair of cheap tennis shoes literally rubbing the fronts down. He was starting to hurt his toes! Timberlands have saved his feet and they last. I usually order up a half size and he can wear them for a year! He loves his boots.
customer_reviews.author: JackieB

customer_reviews.title: You can expect high quality
customer_reviews.text: I just love these boots!! They look awesome and they are original Timberlands. I don’t know why people question that at all. Anyway, I ordered size 6 Big Kids and my European shoe size is 38/39. In the US, my size is 7.5/8 for women. They are black-black and I love it. The boots come packaged properly and they are very comfortable. If I didn’t have a limit with my luggage when I go back home, I would probably order another color too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brand name you can trust. Timberland boots have been around forever & last forever. We purchased these as a replacement for our sons boots from the previous year ( same exact ones ) he wore the heck out of them! Great quality, durability & comfort! Worth every penny. our sons boots see mud, water, sand, corn & who knows what else & I'm talking serious amounts of each!
customer_reviews.author: Amie Wargo

customer_reviews.title: not a great fitting boot-no foot support
customer_reviews.text: i have a hard time finding a wide enough boot-this is a little too wide-not waterproof at all-had to treat them with a waterproofing-can't lace them up tightly either-not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a Young girl
customer_reviews.text: These were for a lil girl that loves timberland's. My 1st time ordering from Anazon. Will follow up with her to see how they're holding up.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Classic... Need anyone say more?
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old son LOVES them. Wears them every day almost. I grew up wearing Tims and I'm glad the style is having a resurgence again. Bought them a tad big for him so they fit a bit longer. He doesn't mind at all and wears a heavier sock with them since it's snowy and cold outside. Even better, they'll fit me when he's done with them and they'll be all broken in for me.
customer_reviews.author: DuskySky

customer_reviews.title: A good shoe with one design flaw
customer_reviews.text: the design flaw is this: at the lace holes closest to the toes it is tight. the shoe needed to have more room for the foot to enter there. regardless of whether it is the right size for the foot, it needs more room at this point. it could be a cutting mistake. I don't think it is. Perhaps you could stretch this out if you wet it. my kid does not have much arch at all and foot isn't too large for the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: bristleconepines

customer_reviews.title: They're worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite boots EVER! Buy them every year and always from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Good for my hyper flexible son!
customer_reviews.text: My son needs these boots to help stabilize his ankle joint and learn to walk. He’s double jointed and these help. Physical therapist loves them! Also they look stylish of course.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! I requested a size 6
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! I requested a size 6.5 but received a size 6.0. Upon trying it on I realized the 6.0 fit wayyyy better than the 6.5 would have. I recommended going AT LEAST a half size down. However a whole size down is optimal. The product was clean, no glue stains or scratches to the swade. Great price ( well below retail) great product. Would buy from this seller again. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dani B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had tims since HS and so i decided to buy some online and they fit perfectly!!! They are true to size and color.
customer_reviews.author: Yxa C. Dahms

customer_reviews.title: Saved money by buying kids’ size.
customer_reviews.text: One shoe lace end was frayed and can’t be laced through the eyelets.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Just a bit large, and although I did use the printed off guide to check for fit, I ordered a size smaller than the guide recommended. I'm glad I did, as these boots still gave me plenty of room for two pair of socks! I normally wear a 7 in women's sizes and a 5 in boy's, but the guide said to order a size 6.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy K

customer_reviews.title: I really love them!!!!!❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy them I would love to get another pair but the another color
customer_reviews.author: Marta Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! After reading all the comments above i decided to buy this cuties ,I'm glad I did they do come is the original box ,they have the scan code So yes this are authentic 100. Oh🤔 i' m 8.5 woman and I got the 6.5 in boys fits👌👍👏 thank you seller..
customer_reviews.author: BEMBIES

customer_reviews.title: Had to replace shoelaces with longer ones.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice boots and seem to be holding up well with my 7 year old who is really really rough on shoes. The only gripe that I have with them is that I had to purchase shoelaces for them. These are on the shorter side in length, come untied easily and make it harder for kids who are "learning to tie their shoes". Longer laces worked better.
customer_reviews.author: obriensquared

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing unique beautiful boot!
customer_reviews.text: My little 2 year old granddaughter absolutely loves her new Tim's. I love the unique color. They blend in well with just about everything she wears. I highly recommend this cute little all weather boot. You can pair them with leggings, skirts, Jean's, even dresses. These boots truly belong in your little fashionista's wardrobe!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Crawford

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in a big boy size for a granddaughter who is very petite. They are of excellent quality. She requested them for Christmas and loves them. I myself prefer a darker color but she wanted the wheat. I easily returned a smaller size for 1/2 size bigger. I love Amazon customer service. Amazon always has what I am looking for, a quality product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: VilleChick

customer_reviews.title: Great, perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product for a 13 month baby bought a size bigger. So far i love the little pink boots.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Loved the boots, but they fit too big.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the boots, they look just as the picture, they are comfortable but I had to exchange them because they run way too large!
customer_reviews.author: M. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my grandson. He LOVES his boots, he thinks they’re the COOLEST BOOTS EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Fits true to size. I wear same size in converse all star. I am adult but wear kids sizes.I like the color and how they look very black not gray. Considering getting other colors. Only downfall is I they more on the expensive side. But considering that these boots are versatile I think that it may justify the price... a little.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 7.5 in women's shoes and fit a 5.5 kids perfectly. These are the best workbooks I've purchased so far, very comfy and I can wear for long periods of time. It did take over three weeks to break them in, but now that I did, these are my favorite boots. I've worn them in all kinds of weather (snow, rain, sunshine, mud). My feet have not gotten wet and they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter in the wet Western Washington fall and winter during El Nino 2016. They're holding up really well! She's got really wide feet and I was worried Timberland wide wouldn't be enough, but no worries. She can wear thick boot socks in them with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: digi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot! just wished I would've gotten one size smaller...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the quality of the boot. Authentic and very easy to find when this book is sold out in stores. My son loved them, they just are a little big on his foot. Since he's in a 13 now I should've gotten a 12, I'd advise to go a whole size smaller because these do run big, but I should've remembered that most boots run big, but awesome buy. Very happy, will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as part of our 3-year-olds construction birthday gift. Totally worth it. You are paying for the quality, but if you live somewhere with moderate winters (such as outer-DC) then they work as winter boots. We had to exchange for a larger size though. These are the kind of boots you buy if you want to be able to hand them down to a younger sibling or cousin or friend - at least twice!
customer_reviews.author: Rose S. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Could have bought real kids ones for the same price and better quality.
customer_reviews.text: You can definitely tell these are not authentic if you've ever owned a pair of timbs before. Not worth it for the price. Could have bought real kids ones for the same price and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kota Rose

customer_reviews.title: I was better off going into my local foot locker and seeing ...
customer_reviews.text: These came with two small damages on the shoe. There was glue or some sticky something on the upper black part if the top of the shoe and and a small groove/ indention at the base of the tongue. I needed them for the night so I wore them but warn people to be cautious when dealing with this seller. I was better off going into my local foot locker and seeing what I was getting in person. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: They sent me the wrong size!
customer_reviews.text: Love Timbs, always pleased with how well they are made, and how long they last. This order came exactly when expected, but the Big Kids US 5.5 size I ordered probably would've fit better than the Big Kids US size 6 that came! Such a bummer, since the I paid $55 for the size 6, and now to order a 5.5 it will cost me $89! (and who knows if it will the actual size I order will come?) We have snow on the ground, and It's still a good deal so I'll give it another shot, but I'm just bummed about the way it went down.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Fits.
customer_reviews.text: First pair was too big. So I gave them away. This pair fit perfectly. I'm usually a 6.5 in kids or a 7 in womens
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: His other shioes and sneakers are size 5 but because other reviews recommended. 5 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was formy 10yr old grandson. His other shioes and sneakers are size 5 but because other reviews recommended .5 size smaller, I ordered size 4.5. When he knew the boots were size 4.5, he complained they were tight. A few days late thread wearing them with no complaints. He lioves his Timberlands boots; The cost was more than I wanted to pay but ithe quality not as good
customer_reviews.author: familyshopper

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent boot. My daughter is so happy with it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent boot. My daughter is so happy with it and the breaking in time was much shorter, and less painful, than she thought! And we love Timberland's social mission.
customer_reviews.author: TikkunOlam

customer_reviews.title: Great price for women 👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter who is 16 yrs old. She wanted a pair and I did the research and found big kid size can be converted to women's size
customer_reviews.author: April Hill

customer_reviews.title: Adore the shoe but the fabric sucks
customer_reviews.text: My son wore one time to see how they fit, the fabric has worn off and I just purchases these....I will be returning them
customer_reviews.author: Kay T.

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: The boots were perfect had alittle extra room but they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Walker

customer_reviews.title: I normally wear size 8 for boots for women and I purchased a size 6 and it fit my feet fine. My complaint is that the insoles ar
customer_reviews.text: The pair of boots fit just as a I imagined it would. I normally wear size 8 for boots for women and I purchased a size 6 and it fit my feet fine. My complaint is that the insoles are not the usual color of timberlands and the logo is not dark brown like real timberlands. As a matter of fact, the logo is the same color as the boots which is a mustard yellow. I also do not see the serial numbers every timberland boots should have. So, I suspect that these boots are fake. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wu

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the black and wheat. Black fit perfect I LOVE THEM but wheat boot was weird. It was much higher in length and had some scratches. Keeping the black exchanging the wheat. Hoping the next pair is better.
customer_reviews.author: Gissell Bueno

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: One thing I noticed is that he came back from camp and water seemed to penetrate the boot so I would advise to spray with waterproof spray before and after use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Great Price! Great Fit! Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are at least $80 in the stores and I got them here for $71. The fit was perfect and they are a good quality. I usually get one pair of Timberland boots for my son every year because his feet grow so fast. I am very pleased with this purchase, and I would highly recommend that anyone looking for these boots for boys purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Boots are nice just way bigger then his normal tennis shoe size go a half a size down
customer_reviews.author: Jerome macline 69

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my nephew birthday the color was great jet black and the fit was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Pawprints35

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Timbs for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I got my boots from the seller "why pay more And fast shipping". The boots were Authentic and in great condition. I was a little bit skeptical given the low price, but I spoke to someone from the seller mentioned above and they assured me that the boots were authentic. Very pleased with my purchase. I'd say they are true to size. This Bronx Native is happy with her purchase. Can't live in New York and NOT have a pair of Timbs. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Melanie_and_David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am a perfect size 7 and I ordered a 5 in big kids. These fit perfectly with a little bit of room for socks or whatever. I am really happy that I did not order a half or full size up or down. They are certainly authentic and they arrived very quickly. I love them! Sooooo happy that I did my research and bough from this seller. The price was awesome because I didn't want to spend over $100 on shoes so I'm very happy with my choice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite of both my sons
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He keeps buying it over and over again as he is hard on his boots although they hold up remarkably well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Whang Schutter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good-looking but uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these look and they are very sturdy, but both of my boys (one little, one big) complain about them being uncomfortable. Even for the sale price, the price is hard to swallow if your kid doesn't want to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Kfox

customer_reviews.title: Love these Timbs!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her new Timbs! They fit perfect, true to size, good support, and perfect for winter weather. For reference, she normally wears a size 9 in women's shoes, and the gradeschool size 7 fit perfectly. Very happy on Christmas morning! Thanks Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: T Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed the box was torn, both boots looked like someone tried them on and walked around in them. The soles of the boots looked new, however there was a crease in both boots and the tongue on one boot was wrinkled. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Balun

customer_reviews.title: Stain on the “NEW” Boots.  So Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The Boot Looks Good. Just need to point that out. It have Couple of Stain dots. And that makes it Not Worth it ir New. As there not Cheap. Thinking on returning after Christmas. Bummer as will look use with that stain.
customer_reviews.author: Arat Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size chart
customer_reviews.text: I give 1 not for the quality of shoes, but for the size chart. The size chart is so wrong on amazon.com I have order size 7, but as I live in Europe I needed an European size, so I looked up on size chart and saw that size 23 is US 7, but when I got the shoes it is written 23.5.
customer_reviews.author: Lilit

customer_reviews.title: great boot
customer_reviews.text: I need a pair of waterproof boots but didn't want to spend a fortune. The reviews on this boot were so helpful. I wear a women's size 71/2-8 so I ordered the kid size 6. The fit is great and I have enough room for heavier socks if I should need them. They look great and came in a Timberland box...the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown. Very sturdy boot for an active preschooler
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: SIZING IS WAY OFF but great quality
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would list a size cross reference chart. Cause the boot says 6.5 US but 39 EUR which really equates to 8.5 US womens. Bought for my daughter for xmas is says toddler/little kid/big kid so I thought she petite 6 is her size perfect! NOT the shoes fit me & I am am 8.5 now I can even get her size for the same price. Great quality though just need to work out the sizing issue
customer_reviews.author: A. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this to others. If you are going to be standing for a long period then I'd suggest cushions for the soles. Other than that these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Aknldy

customer_reviews.title: Costly
customer_reviews.text: Love these little boots. Only problem is that $80 is alot to pay for boots that I child can only wear one year ( they're still growing) Luckily I only had to buy one pair. I won't recommend these for parents with lots of children
customer_reviews.author: Katonga Radford

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. I couldn’t find them in the store anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They feel good to walk in, they’re warm, and they’re comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: NYC Not Having That!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it no stars if that were an option. I ordered these boots, which would have been my son's 1st in a great while, for his fall season as a freshman in middle school. Thought I found myself ahead of the game only to be set behind schedule. I swear, I took one look at them and didn't even bother having him try them on! DISAPPOINTED TO THE MAX! You can tell by the soles they weren't "obviously previously" worn, SO WTH HAPPENED???! I don't even know where to start. The pictures will have to speak for me. Needless to say, I'm a BROOKLYNITE. Timbs are Life in NY but they Absolutely Must Be FRESH!! UGH!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: These are really beautifully made boots. I bought them in black for my 12 year old daughter in the Big Kids size 5 and she loves them. Very high quality material and craftsmanship. Exactly what one expects from Timberland products. Best of all, I got them for approximately $50 less here on Amazon than what they sell for on the Timberland website. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Branch

customer_reviews.title: My grandson lives in these. They are durable enough ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson lives in these. They are durable enough to handle the life of a very active and outdoorsy 8 year old. He's been wearing them ever since he was a baby and they always do the job.
customer_reviews.author: RIRedd

customer_reviews.title: Timbs A-OK!
customer_reviews.text: Cool, exactly what My son waited for a couple dollar less.
customer_reviews.author: Datoplookindown

customer_reviews.title: I liked them but they were a bit short in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked them but they were a bit short in the toe box. I usually wear a solid 6.5 and ordered these in a 4.5 kids size (which equates to 6.5) and they were too small. I'm exchanging for a size 5.
customer_reviews.author: L. Edgar

customer_reviews.title: MY SON IS THRILLED!
customer_reviews.text: Quality boots at a GREAT price. My son LOVES them and wears them every day! He couldn't wait to show his friends his new Timberlands! They fit in perfectly, his feet stay dry, even in the snow! And he's as happy as can be. Couldn't ask for anything more!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Turner

customer_reviews.title: They love it! Although they cannot really play in it ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son and daughter to wear (under 10 years of age). They love it! Although they cannot really play in it since it is obviously more for fashion than durability. I myself as an adult have owned a couple pairs and love it!
customer_reviews.author: T-Gang!

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this
customer_reviews.text: Authentic timberlands bought 2 pairs for my sons. Satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and super fast shipping! Wheat color sold out in many stores, ordered on the spot after running around with no luck. Wasn't supposed to receive until 12/26 but these arrived Christmas Eve! Saved the Holiday! Size 7 for 12 year old was great. A little extra room for a growing kid.
customer_reviews.author: NickKnack

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color
customer_reviews.text: Run large. I bought a size 6 but 5 would have been better. I wear a 6 1/2 women
customer_reviews.author: katrina joyce

customer_reviews.title: Fake timberland!
customer_reviews.text: Got this pair with higher price from Footwear Plus for the free returns. Now I’m glad that I did that because it’s fake! See the comparison in outlook and tag between the new pair and my old pair
customer_reviews.author: Freda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and durable
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped quickly and great packaging. It was in perfect condition and the product was received as described. It looks perfect and fits just right my son really enjoys protective shoe as he stomps around in them. I would definitely use this seller again for any other items I might come across.
customer_reviews.author: Elyssa

product_meta.title: Timberland Kids 6" Premium Waterproof Boots for Toddlers
product_meta.description: These kids' boots are inspired by the original Timberland boots that we began manufacturing nearly 40 years ago. We believe in offering the exact same top-quality leather and sturdy construction in our kids' footwear that we offer in our adult product lines, so you can feel confident that these 100% waterproof boots will protect kids' feet through puddles, rain, mud and whatever else gets in their way.
feature_bullets: KID-SIZED: These kids' waterproof boots are inspired by the original Timberland boots, with the same rugged outdoor styling & hard-wearing construction. These are built to protect kids' feet through puddles, rain, mud & whatever else gets in their way.

LOOK NO FURTHER for trail-ready performance and style. Our selection of kid's hiking boots, waterproof hiking boots, casual boots, and casual shoes is designed to keep your littlest traveler exploring in style.

TIMBERLAND BOOTS are synonymous with quality workmanship. Whether you're looking for mens boots, womens boots, or kids boots, Timberland has you covered. For the best in hiking boots, rain boots, work boots, casual shoes & boots & more, choose Timberland.

WHAT YOU NEED IN THE OUTDOORS: Timberland isn't just for high-quality mens, womens, and kids boots. We have the gear you need for all your outdoor adventures, including jackets and coats for outdoor activities, backpacks and luggage & outdoor accessories.

THE BEST IN OUTDOORS: See how Timberland's line of outdoor wear stacks up to hiking boots and outdoor gear from brands like Columbia, Merrell, Vasque, Oboz, Hi Tec, Doc Martens, Uggs, Muck Boots, Keen, Maelstrom, Justin, Hunter, Bogs, Nike, or Sorel.
